name: Gulch.io - Battle Royale
description:
Collect weapons, attachments, ammo and armor while fending off attacks from other players. The map gradually decreases in size as a toxic cloud encroaches and consumes all players caught within it. The last player alive wins.

Controls Move: W A S D Look: Mouse Shoot: Left Click Aim: Right Click Open Doors: F Pick Up Items: F Inventory: I Map: M Chat: Enter Show Debug: Insert
